title: The Gathering Storm
description: While many Americans are searching for the best online holiday deals and figuring out what to watch on Netflix tonight, a storm is gathering. Decisions that are being made right now could radically alter the course of human history, but most of the population…
content:
This article was originally published by Michael Snyder at The End of the American Dream.
